column3: PURPOSE (should be a verb phrase to sound right while installing)
is the main graphical user interface and window manager.
is for transparency and removing screen-tearing.
is the emoji font of LARBS.
provides the sans and serif fonts for LARBS.
is for setting up icons and themes
is an extensive terminal file manager that everyone likes.
lists directory contents like trees. Used by vifm.
is for starting apps and much more
is a tool for detecting window properties.
allows your computer to access dos-like filesystems.
can record and splice video and audio on the command line.
gives the dark GTK theme used in LARBS.
an tidier vim with some useful features
is a terminal interface for mpd.
is the patrician's choice video player.
a ncurses interface for music with multiple formats and a powerful tag editor.
does exactly what it sounds like.
is the only program on LARBS your girlfriend has ever heard of.
is an audio interface with ALSA.
is an intuitive ncurses audio controller.
is a terminal image-manipulator providing some convenient shortcuts and the lockscreen in LARBS.
is an Excel-like terminal spreadsheet manager.
provides system usage information and displays processes.
can take quick screenshots at your request.
parses URLs in the terminal allowing keyboard-based selection.
is a terminal browser which can also view images.
gives the special escape/super mappings of LARBS.
allows for copying and pasting from the command line.
provides window action utilities on the command line.
aids with resolution determination and screen recording.
can download any YouTube video (or playlist or channel) when given the link.
is a pdf viewer with vim-like bindings.
allows mupdf pdf compatibility in zathura.
manipulates .pdfs and gives .pdf previews and other .pdf functions.
shows audio and video information and is used by vifm as well.
manages and gives information about archives.
queues commands or files for download.
